Posts.Content: How concered should I be over a call back on right breast?
Posts.Title: abnormal mammogram

Posts.Content: On Oct 19, 2011 7:23 PM Ladylacy wrote: Don't worry too much but go back and get retested.  I had my mammogram in April and then was called back.  Went back and they did a CT on my right breast and then I was told it was nothing to be concerned about.  I got a second opinion from a breast doctor and was told it was nothing to worry about.  Apparently I had had the same problem in the past but this year they decided to do a CT scan.  The breast doctor did one in the office and said everything was fine just continue to get my yearly mammograms.  My younger sister is a 9 year breast cancer survivor so naturally I was worried. Hi,  Thank you for replying to me.  I know that it can be nothing...it's just telling my brain to wait and see.  Pray you are well and your sister continues to do well.
Posts.Title: abnormal mammogram
